title: 4.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
An automobile sales representative is assigned to find the top-of-the-line model from the companyâ€™s inventory to demonstrate to prospective clients. However, manually sorting prices can take a lot of time and effort. So, the representative stores the costs of the models in an array.

The given array is the cost of automobile models in lakhs (dollars).


Write a Python program using an array to identify the most expensive model (maximum price) and also print the minimum price among all the models.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1

 3
